gamesTable.createGame: Create a game to get started.

deleteDialog.title: Are you sure?
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete this game. This cannot be undone.

createGameDialog.title: Create new game
createGameDialog.description: Create a new scoreboard to start tracking scores for your game.
createGameDialog.gameTypeDescription: Select the type of game you want to keep scores of.

scoreboard.gameNotFound: Game not found. Try again later.

createGameDialog.title: Create new Klaverjas game
createGameDialog.description: Fill in the names for your teams.

createRoundDialog.title: Add new round
createRoundDialog.description: Fill in all the information for this round. Make sure to fill in the fame as it is scored in the round. A fame switch will be taken into account when you click on "Wet".
createRoundDialog.editDescription: Edit the information for this round. Make sure to fill in the fame as it is scored in the round. A fame switch will be taken into account when you click on "Wet".
createRoundDialog.isGoingSelectLabel: Choose who is going this round
